announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for Easter Sunday.
announcements.title: Commentary: Easter Sunday

announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 20th April, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Communicants, Tuesday borns and Christian Mothers Association. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: Easter Sunday

announcements.details: On Monday, April 21st, 2025, we shall conclude our Easter celebrations with a fun-filled day by celebrating a joint picnic with Epiphany Catholic Church and Corpus Christi. More details will come soon.
announcements.title: Easter Monday Picnic

events.details: Date: 21st April, 2025 | Venue: St Bakhita Catholic Church
events.title: Easter Monday Picnic

masses.details: Mass will begin after evening prayers
masses.subtitle: Thursday at 7pm
masses.title: Holy Thursday

masses.details: Stations of the Cross begins at 7am, and Veneration of the Cross at 3pm
masses.subtitle: Friday at 7am & 3pm
masses.title: Good Friday
